item.description:
Mad science, high technology, and deep magic - Battle diabolical villains and ferocious monsters, discover strange new worlds and uncover ancient riddles! The Ways are open, though only the bold need tread them. Join us for an all-new series of adventures incorporating both our foam swords and NERF blasters. Action, adventure, and epic battles await you in the new storyline - learn new tricks and techniques to augment your fighting ability. This event is designed for ages 10 and up.

Call us at 781-270-4800 to pre-register; $15/member, $20/nonmember.
item.name: Adventure Night: Tales of High Adventure!
